sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 15-2-2 - Recompiled
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-1, enacted by Laws 1977, ch. 247, § 23; Laws 1978, ch. 124, § 3; 1980, ch. 151, § 9; 1983, ch. 301, § 39; 2007, ch. 290, § 13; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-1, recompiled as 9-27-13 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-1 NMSA 1978, relating to telecommunications services, as 9-27-13 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-2, enacted by Laws 1977, ch. 247, § 24; 1978, ch. 124, § 4; 1980, ch. 151, § 10; 1983, ch. 301, § 40; 2007, ch. 290, § 14; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-2, recompiled as 9-27-14 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-2 NMSA 1978, relating to radio communications, as 9-27-14 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1978 Comp., § 15-2-2.1, enacted by Laws 1997, ch. 263, § 1; 2007, ch. 288, § 2; 2007, ch. 290, § 15; recompiled as 9-27-15 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-2.1 NMSA 1978, relating to lease of radio communications network, as 9-27-15 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-2.1, enacted by Laws 1970, ch. 71, § 1; 1975, ch. 214, § 1; 1977, ch. 247, § 25; 1978, ch. 124, § 5; 1980, ch. 151, § 11; 1983, ch. 301, § 41; 2007, ch. 290, § 16; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-3, recompiled as 9-27-16 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-3 NMSA 1978, relating to services charges, as 9-27-16 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-3, enacted by Laws 1966, ch. 32, § 3; 1971, ch. 115, § 1; 1977, ch. 247, § 26; 1978, ch. 124, § 6; 1980, ch. 151, § 12; 1983, ch. 301, § 42; 2007, ch. 290, § 17; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-4, recompiled as 9-27-17 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-4 NMSA 1978, relating to exclusion from jurisdiction, as 9-27-17 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-4, enacted by Laws 1971, ch. 115, § 2; 1977, ch. 247, § 27; 1978, ch. 124, § 7; 1980, ch. 151, § 13; 1983, ch. 301, § 43; 2007, ch. 290, § 18; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-5, recompiled as 9-27-18 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-5 NMSA 1978, relating to property transfer, as 9-27-18 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 81, § 15 repealed former 15-2-6 and 15-2-7 NMSA 1978 as amended by Laws 1978, ch. 124, § 8 and Laws 1980, ch. 151, § 14 relating to radio equipment amortization, effective May 21, 1986.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-26-7, enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 214, § 4; 1977, ch. 247, § 29; 1978, ch. 124, § 10; 1980, ch. 151, § 15; 1983, ch. 301, § 44; 2007, ch. 290, § 19; 1978 Comp., § 15-2-8, recompiled as 9-27-19 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-2-8 NMSA 1978, relating to transfer of property, custody and control, as 9-27-19 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.
